text: Q3. | Consider the following two implementation of bubble sort? VoidSort1 (int arr [, int n) VoidSort2(intarr [], int n) { { for (i = 0;1i<n-1;i++) if (n > 1) { for (j = 0; j < n-i-1; j++) for (int i=0; i<n-1; i++) if (arr[j] >= arr[j+1]) if (arrfi] >arr[i+1]) swap(arr|i], swap(arrlj], arr[j+1]); arr(i+1]); } Sort2(arr, n-1); } } Which of the above implementation is/are stable? [EVROJsIAl (b) Only II (c) Both I and II (d) neither I nor II PP TS
